_header: Late when Aurora of Titan took leave
_description: John Lydgate, a Balade with the refrain: ‘To fynde a freond at neode’ — seventeen 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BodAsh59.First Lines:
Late whane Aurora of Tytane toke loveNought longe agone in a gladde
                    mornyngSoole by my self walking in a greveGoldyne Phebus feyre in
                    chare shyninge…
BodAsh59.Last Lines:
…ffor Maries sake be oure proteccounAnd helpe alle þoo
                    þat calne þee at þeire nede
BodAsh59.Attributed Title:
Here begynneþe a Polletyke Balade ryale made by þat approbate
                    Poete Lidegate þe Munk of Burye [with] with þe gode Refrayde / To
                    fynde a freonde at neode (f. 35)
